name: Ultimate Obstacle Course - Prologue
description:
Ultimate Obstacle Course - Prologue

Welcome to the first episode of an infinite playground of possibilities, where intense, adrenaline-fueled free running meets immersive VR simulation. Run, jump and slide your way through a virtual gauntlet with your body as the controller, and prove yourself to be the ultimate obstacle runner.

Competitors and level designers will have the tools to create challenging and visually striking courses in VR. Combine varieties of blocks and game mechanics to create all new courses and a completely customised gameplay experience. You’ll be able to share your levels, challenge your friends, and even participate in high stakes tournaments.

Make it. Run it. Share it.

Ultimate Obstacle Course - Prologue is a small taste of the much bigger vision from Dark Slope, to create an incredible competitive and creative community of runners and designers. As well as a platform to build, create, play and share experiences with friends, we are making a competitive VR esport that everyone can be a part of.
